title: Emergency contact automatically deleted
content:
Hello!
I have set 3 emergency contacts, but one (the only in the country I live in...) keeps disappearing from emergency contacts
When I open the emergency contacts (from long press on the power button) I see it for a couple of seconds only...
I don't think it is linked but this is also the only contact I have whose I've set the birthday and yet it doesn't appear on my calendar (even if it works perfectly fine for all my others contacts)

I hope someone can help :-) thank you!
